rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wide entrance area leading to the courtyard.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space adjoining the central courtyard with Vastu-aligned seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room and designed for traditional dining practices.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen space located near the entrance but with a separate pathway to the courtyard.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace with natural light and Vastu-aligned placement on the north side of the floor plan.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private bedroom for parents with an attached walk-in closet and private bathroom.

rooms.name: Child's Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious room for children, designed keeping traditional Kerala aesthetics in mind.

openings.description: Main entrance door leading to the central courtyard.
Large windows facing the central courtyard providing natural light and air flow, in accordance with Vastu principles.
